summary.para: Gets a GUID that identifies the track's underlying data format.

param.name: format
param.para: A GUID that identifies the track's underlying data format.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a value indicating the error type of the latest error associated with the track.

returns.para: Type:
A value indicating the error type of the latest error associated with the track.

summary.para: Gets the extended error code for the latest error associated with the track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
The extended error code for the latest error associated with the track.

remarks.para: If the most recent error was associated with a track, this value will be the same HRESULT as returned by the method.

summary.para: Gets the identifier of the track of timed text.

returns.para: Type: DWORD
Returns the identifier of the track.

summary.para: Gets the in-band metadata of the track.

param.name: dispatchType
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the in-band metadata of the track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the label of the track.

param.name: label
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the language of the track.

param.name: language
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the language of the track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the kind of timed-text track.

returns.para: Type:
Returns a -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text track.

summary.para: Determines whether the timed-text track is active.

returns.para: Type: BOOL
Returns whether the timed-text track is active. If TRUE, the timed-text track is active; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: Determines whether the timed-text track is inband.

returns.para: Type: BOOL
Returns whether the timed-text track is inband. If TRUE, the timed-text track is inband; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: Sets the label of a timed-text track.

param.name: label
param.para: A pointer to a null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents a track of timed text.
